Posts.Content: cairnlover wrote: hey everyone!  i'm new here and i just have a question.  i'm 27 but i have a family hx of breast CA.  my father's sister and my great aunt (mothers side of the family).  i noticed 2 lumps in my left breast 2 weeks ago.  one is sorta soft and the other (almost on the breast bone) is hard about the size of a dime.  neither are sore.  the lymph nodes on the left side of my neck are also slightly swollen.  who should i contact.  my OBGYN or general surgeon?   thanks for all of the advice in advance!
